name: Rhythm Blocks
description:
Rhythm Blocks is a musical twist on a classic, familiar puzzle game. Make your moves in-time with the background music or you'll lose points.

Credits
Programmed by Lucas J
Soundtrack by Syndio C

Submission for Mini-Jam 71.

Note: Although this is my submission, it's pretty far from a polished game. Due to restrictions in the pygame library, I was unable to sync the music up with the gameplay 1:1, and it's likely there will be game-breaking latency. With that said, it's not impossible that the game will run smoothly for you. If it does, great! If not, I'm sorry, and I hope that sometime in the future I have the motivation to return to this project and find a solution.
